description: Leatherleaf sedge (Carex buchananii 'Red Rooster') is an amazing plant species. It has an elegant clump forming foliage with dramatic sword shaped leaves which grow evergreen and turn shades of fiery red in the winter. This European native also features unique fluffy-textured flowers which have curled golden-bronze spikes in late summer and autumn. It can grow up to 1 foot tall and is ideal for rock gardens, moist meadows, and woodlands. It's also suitable for low maintenance sunny and partially shaded areas. The versatility of the leatherleaf sedge is definitely worth admiring!
